title: [Large-Scale] Problem-Based Learning (PBL)-Driven Mathematical Modeling for ESG and Sustainable Development

context.prior_knowledge: Knowledge of basic statistics and linear algebra, along with an understanding of fundamental ESG concepts
context.additional_context: Emphasizes mathematical modeling competencies for ESG data analysis and sustainable development strategy formulation in online environments for professionals (medical/legal/technical)

learning_goals: One can build a carbon emission estimation model by mathematically analyzing real-world ESG data.
Through a PBL approach, one can present strategies for achieving Sustainable Development Goals (SDGs) via multidisciplinary team collaboration.
One can quantitatively evaluate ESG performance using data visualization tools and write decision-making reports.
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
